Content: An Editor of Silumina and Resa Newspapers Chamara Lakshan has passed away. He has passed away while undergoing treatment at the Intensive Care Unit of the Colombo National Hospital following a heart attack. He was 39 years old at the time of his demise. He was a political Analyst and the youngest Editor to be appointed to the Silumina Newspaper. He worked at Lakbima, Rivira and Irudina Newspapers for some time.
